Blue.

## TL;DR

## Quick picker
- Want a default shade? Options:

  - Royal — #4169E1
  - Sky — #38B6FF

Tell me your pick and I’ll use it by default.
What is my second favorite crypto?

Bitcoin (BTC).

## TL;DR
- Your favorites in order: XMR (1), BTC (2), XLM (3), USDT (4).
- I’ll prioritize BTC second in any summaries, charts, or alerts.
